name: nn0negzi

body.origin:
|- wcel(cneg(c0), cz)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cneg(c0), cz))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cneg(c0), cz)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)

comment: The negative of a nonnegative integer is an integer. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Feb-2014.)
